Author: dennisch123
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Blue Whale - The Decentralized Ecosystem for the Self-Employed
Body: Why do you think Freelancer, Guru, PeoplePerHour, etc are so successful, clearly there is a demand for freelance platforms.  We are turning our own freelance platform into a zero-commission platform, which provides a HUGE benefit to freelancers as all the other platforms charge up to 20% commission.

Author: dennisch123
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Blue Whale - The Decentralized Ecosystem for the Self-Employed
Body: I asked a few questions in their Telegram to which I yet have to receive an answer so I post them here:  Anyone has a link to the actual freelance platform?  Do I read it correct that $22.3 million was sold during the presale, and only $400k during the public ICO?  Where are those funds stored, can someone post the wallet here?  Users complain that the coins are getting dumped by the whales, I'm suspicious about the success of this ICO campaign, and can't stop wondering that those whales that are dumping their coins are actually the Bluewhale Foundation themselves.  Turning it into just another ICO scam / dump fest.

Author: andro hac
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Blue Whale - The Decentralized Ecosystem for the Self-Employed
Body: Blue Whale Fdn is  join forces with Freelancers EU to celebrate the world's freelance community. This collaboration aims to foster greater global reach between the East and West. European Freelancers Week (#EFWeek) is the world’s largest annual celebration of independent work helping millions of Europeans discover the Freelance Economy. It is carried out as a series of independent events held under a common theme and branding in different European countries.  The third edition of #EFWeek will take place from October 12 to 21, 2018 all across Europe More information here: https://medium.com/blue-whale-foundation/building-bwn-blue-whale-x-european-freelancers-week-ef6ca460ed8e

Author: KarmannGhia
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Blue Whale - The Decentralized Ecosystem for the Self-Employed
Body: Official Announcement From Blue Whale Foundation  We have been informed that there are many people who claim that they did not receive their referral tokens or have received less than they were supposed to.  To address the first point, we have received close to 50,000 submissions for the referral program. Majority of the submission have received their tokens. However, due to suspicious bot activities, we have conducted a manual review as well as applied an algorithm to delete these bots. Based on the feedback that we are getting, we believe that the algorithm might have identified real submissions as bots.  If you believe this to be the case for your submission please take the following action  1) Write an email using the email address that you have submitted 2) Do a print screen of your confirmation email 3) Email it to referral_complain@bluewhale.foundation  If you have gotten less than what you are expecting, this is because the people that you have referred have either  1) Clicked on your link but did not join 2) Joined but left before the campaign ended  If you feel strongly that we have been mistaken, please take the following action  1) Write an email using the email address that you have submitted 2) Provide ample evidence that your referees joined and stayed throughout the campaign 3) Email it to referral_complain@bluewhale.foundation  Once again, we would like to thank our community for their support and rest assure we will work on maintaining FAIRNESS in our programs. Bot activities are NOT tolerated.

Author: pumawolf
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Blue Whale - The Decentralized Ecosystem for the Self-Employed
Body: Notice In Case of Misunderstanding Dear Blue Whale Community, We have heard your feedback and wanted to clarify 2 details:   1) The deadline to pass KYC of 21 May, Midnight 00:00:00 UTC that was communicated previously is for Pre-Sale contributors only!   2) The deadline for Public Sale participants to pass KYC is 31 May at Midnight 00:00:00 UTC (i.e. 30 May, 23:59:59). Contributions will be returned to those Public Sale participants who do not pass KYC before this time.   We hope this helps everyone in our amazing community and apologize if there was any confusion.   As always, if you want to stay get in touch please reach us on our Telegram channel or through our Reddit "Ask Me Anything (AMA)" coming up soon @ 12 Noon UTC on May 22 here: https://www.reddit.com/r/BlueWhaleFdn/   Sincerely, The Blue Whale Team

Author: KarmannGhia
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Blue Whale - The Decentralized Ecosystem for the Self-Employed
Body: [Important Announcement] 🗣  Hello Blue Whale Community  We have great news In lieu of the recent “Bull market” as well as consistent feedbacks from our community and contributors, Blue Whale has reduced the hard cap to 30 million SGD (22.7 million USD).  With 25 million SGD raised from Private and Pre sales, we will only be raising an additional 5 million SGD (3.78 million USD). Tokens that are unsold will be burnt prior to the listing, effectively reducing our circulating supply to 32,160,000,000 BWX from 52,800,000,000 BWX. Please note that our fixed rate remains the same at 1 SGD : 800 BWX OR 1.32 SGD : 1 USD : 1,056 BWX  Foremost, the public sales will start on 24th May 2018, Midnight GMT and continue for one month. There will be Maximum Cap but the exact cap will be announced later in May.  Finally, coming soon will be our much anticipated and refurbished Website and White paper.  The best way to stay updated is through our strong Telegram group to get further ICO details. If you have questions, please do ask our “Admins” (@sophieahn & @ryanchew18 ) on Telegram “@bluewhalefdn  Best Blue Whale Team

Author: KarmannGhia
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Blue Whale - The Decentralized Ecosystem for the Self-Employed
Body: Blue Whale Foundation    Website | Whitepaper | Team & Advisers  Twitter | Medium | Reddit | Facebook   What is Blue Whale Foundation?   Blue Whale Foundation aims to create the earth’s most worker-centric ecosystem. We are forming the largest employment pool for business and individuals to connect autonomously in the hyperconnected community which works for all and is owned by all.  Decentralised network disrupts existing centralised platforms which have monopolised public resources, exacerbated economic inequality and increased the wealth gap. Blue Whale's W.O.R.K. system is a revolutionary, sustainable cycle that fuels Sharing Economy.  Whether you are a self-employed or a owner of small business, your benefit and welfare will be covered.   The transparency achieved through blockchain technology means your earnest contribution in the market will be returned to you through Blue Whale's Reward Bank. Coupled with no commission and free tools mean you no longer have to count pennies for marketing and advertising budget for your services.   Management Team   Will Lee, Co-Founder & CEO Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/willwhlee/  Hawon Chung, Co-Founder & COO Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/hawonchung/  Jay Park, Co-Founder Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/wisefree/  Hyun-Jin Choi, Co-Founder & CTO Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/hyun-jin-choi-0037ba/  Jay Choi, Co-Founder & Head of Product Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jaewoongchoi/  Changsup Keum, Co-Founder & CIO    Advisors   Injong Rhee, Former CTO Samsung electronics Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/injong-rhee-1355a4/  Marco Torregrossa, MD at Euro Freelancers Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/marcotorregrossa  Jonghyup Kim, ICON foundation council Member Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jonghyup-kim-29995228/  Kyoung June Lee, ICON foundation council Member Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/wamlaw/  Simon Yu, CEO of StormX Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/simonyu0311/   Quick Stats    Country of Origin: Singapore Pre-Sale Start Date: 2018/04/02 (2018/04/01 for Whitelisted) Token Sale Start Date: TBA ICO price of token: 800 BWX / 1 SGD Whitepaper: https://www.bluewhale.foundation/assets/Bluewhale_White_Paper_ENG_V.pdf Blog: https://medium.com/blue-whale-foundation Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/BlueWhaleFdn/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/BlueWhaleFdn LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/bwx/ Telegram Group: https://t.me/bluewhalefdn Telegram Channel: https://t.me/bwxico Smart contract address: TBA      Join our ICO! Pre-sale opening Soon -> SUBSCRIBE NOW! Together we will make a better Self Employed Ecosystem [/list]

Author: lordzc
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Blue Whale - The Decentralized Ecosystem for the Self-Employed
Body: Dear Blue Whale Supporters,   With the success of Private sales, our Pre-sales has begun for the public today, 2nd April 2018 at Midnight (GMT). We have already completed the cap of Private sales of SGD 10 million in early March and our Pre-sales contribution is following closely as we have just reached over SGD 11 million.  If you are interested in our project and sales, please sign up on our website(bluewhale.foundation) and follow the pre-sale instructions.  Also, please join us on our telegram: https://t.me/bluewhalefdn and ask question or make enquiry to ico@bluewhale.foundation  Thank you, we sincerely appreciate your support.  Best regards, Blue Whale Team
